rules_text:
Trample
Whenever The Incomprehensible attacks, you may have its base power and toughness become ထ/ထ until end of turn. If you do, it loses all abilities until end of turn, can’t have or gain abilities until end of turn, and you can’t cast spells this turn.
notes:
Inspiration — Cosmic Horror, Old Ones

Mechanical Uniqueness — Infinity as a stat in black-border
